column4: I need drivers for: "Dell 1397 WLAN 802.11g" and google is not my friend today...
what does lspci report as the name of your wlan?
my wireless card is named eth1 if that is what you need

nope, type, chip and all that is important to solve the problem, if its not autodetected after a fresh install first connecgt a cable and update your system completely, maybe it will already propose the proper drivers via preferences->hardware drivers
